latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp fails to provides one Lifeguard for 25 campers when using off site facility lifeguard observed supervising more than 3400 ft of pool surface 50 yards of shoreline
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Written Safety Plan incomplete provisions do not address staff facility fire safety medical requirements general and activity specific safety staff training and camper orientation
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Swimming activities not supervised by Aquatics Director Aquatics Director not present during all swimming and water activity
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Progressive Swim Instructor failed to assess the swim ability of all campers prior to participation in aquatic activity
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp operator fails to maintains staff records application qualifications certifications not on file or available for inspection employees education experience training and references not verified

idMinor violations General Violations titleThese are violations that do not pose a direct threat to children but must be corrected within a month by the day care provider to assure the optimal functioning of the child care service Child care services are expected to correct all violations The Department of Health and Mental Hygiene does not perform compliance inspections to determine if
